1499521604082143234.name: Ripple
1499521604082143234.content: We will also be matching Ripple employees’ donations $2-1 to NGOs and humanitarian non-profits, AND are working with our exchange and NGO partners – and the global XRP community – to develop a crypto-to-cash direct giving program that will provide aid to Ukrainian families.
